`jeksterslabRdist` is a collection of functions that I find useful in studying probability distributions.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `jeksterslabRdist` from [GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRdist) with:

```r
library(devtools)
install_github("jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRdist")
```
